ABOUT

I have always had a passion for art since I was young; dabbling in fine arts, textile arts, and photography. At the beginning of 2021, modeling has become one of many art forms I have participated in — and I have fallen in love with it.

Currently, I am an independent travel model and I am not affiliated with any agency at this time. My disciplines include print, runway, and self portraiture during my free time. Being a creative director when planning my own shoots allows me to express my creative abilites in the best ways; from developing concepts, to styling, set design, posing, the list goes on.

While modeling individually, I have further found a lot of success modeling with my boyfriend, Matthew Senger — who is also a model. Together, we are able to meet the high demand for model couples throughout the United States. After a year of working together, we have built a network of over 50 artists in varying disciplines.

I love meeting new people and building connections with others. Please direct any inquiries through my contact form and we can start discussing if we are a good fit!

Talk soon xx,
Summer
